Class Bonus

  • java.lang.Object

extends Element

    • Method Detail

      • stepBonus

        public abstract boolean stepBonus()
        Step the bonus, no effect if activateBonus was not activated.
        Returns:
        false is the bonus MUST BE DELETED. Because its effect has finished. true otherwise.

      • grabBonus

        public void grabBonus(Robot robot)
        Call this method when a robot is grabbing the bonus. Disable the box2d rendering and the rendering of the bonus. Associate the bonus with a world and a robot.
        Parameters:
        robot - Robot that activate the bonus.
